King Eric and His Knights at the Big Bamboo in Bay Street, Nassau/Bahamas - 7" Reel
King Eric and His Knights at the Big Bamboo in Bay Street, Nassau/Bahamas - 7" Reel

On case: "Side A: King Eric and His Knights at the Big Bamboo-1) Limbo Rock, 2) Watermelon on the Vine, 3) Dinasoar, 4) Nassau Market, 5) These are the Times, 6) Fools Rush In, 7) Big Bamboo Bama, 8) Mambo Jambo, 9) Do You Love Me, 10) Uncue You, 11) I Adore Her, 12) Big Bamboo; The Treasure Cove (Rising Sun) Steel Band-Solid Steel- 1) 67, 2) Guantanamera, 3) Watermelon Man, 4) Poor Old Joe, 5) Fire in Your Wire; Side B: Solid Steel Cont.- 1) Governor's Ball (written by Sparrow), 2) Blue Danube, 3) No Money No Love, 4) Sound of Music, 5) Pany Boy, 6) Sandra (written by Sparrow); "Beauty and the Brute Force"- 1) J.B. Williams Road March, 2) Cha Cha Mambo, 3) Woman in Love, 4) Fire Down Below, 5) Zambezi, 6) Breakfast in Bed (Calypso), 7) Calypso Blues, 8) Balisier, 9) Que Sera, Sera, 10) Jamaica Farewell, 11) Banna Song, 12) Autumn Leaves"
